name: Oracle
description: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure offers higher performance, security, and cost savings. It is designed so businesses can move workloads easily from on-premises systems to the cloud, and between cloud and on-premises and other clouds. Oracle Cloud applications provide business leaders with modern applications that help them innovate, attain sustainable growth, and become more resilient.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Cloud Applications and Cloud Platform
ShortDescription: Oracle mission is to help people see data in new ways, discover insights, unlock endless possibilities.
enhanced_description: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure offers a high-performance, secure, and cost-saving cloud platform designed to facilitate the easy movement of business workloads from on-premises systems to the cloud, and seamlessly between various cloud and on-premises environments. Complementing this robust infrastructure, Oracle Cloud applications provide modern solutions for business leaders across various HR domains, including HRMS/HCM, Talent Management, Recruiting, and Total Rewards. These applications are built to help organizations innovate, attain sustainable growth, and become more resilient, aligning with Oracle's mission to empower users to leverage data for new insights and endless possibilities. The comprehensive suite supports critical HR functions such as health and well-being, financial security, and flexibility and time off, while aiming to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Cloud migration and management of workloads (on-premises to cloud, multi-cloud)
Managing employee health and well-being programs
Handling employee flexibility and time off requests
HR data analytics and insights generation
competitive_advantages: Ease of workload migration between on-premises, cloud, and multi-cloud environments
Modern applications for innovation, sustainable growth, and business resilience
roi_benefits: Support for business innovation and sustainable growth
